verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H7586>Saul:<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7355>love<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H2391>strength.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress,<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> my <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H6697>strength,<s%> in whom I will <S%H2620>trust;<s%> my <S%H4043>buckler,<s%> and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and my high <S%H4869>tower.<s%>
I will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised:<s%> so shall I be <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> me, and the <S%H5158>floods<s%> of ungodly <S%H1100>men<s%> made me <S%H1204>afraid.<s%>
The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> compassed me <S%H5437>about:<s%> the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me.

In my <S%H6862>distress<s%> I called <S%H7121>upon<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7768>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H430>God:<s%> he <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of his <S%H4480>temple,<s%> <S%H1964><s%> and my <S%H7775>cry<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, even into his <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>trembled;<s%> the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> also of the <S%H2022>hills<s%> <S%H7264>moved<s%> and were <S%H1607>shaken,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H2734>wroth.<s%>

There went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of his <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> out of his <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H398>devoured:<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> were <S%H1197>kindled<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> it.
He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> also, and came <S%H3381>down:<s%> and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> was <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
And he <S%H7392>rode<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and did <S%H5774>fly:<s%> yea, he did <S%H1675>fly<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

He <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2824>darkness<s%> his secret <S%H5643>place;<s%> his <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him were <S%H2824>dark<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> and thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>
At the <S%H4480>brightness<s%> <S%H5051><s%> that was <S%H5048>before<s%> him his thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H5674>passed,<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> stones and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also <S%H7481>thundered<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and the <S%H5945>Highest<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H6963>voice;<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> stones and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
Yea, he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them; and he shot <S%H7232>out<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings,<s%> and <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> them.

Then the <S%H650>channels<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were <S%H1540>discovered<s%> at thy <S%H4480>rebuke,<s%> <S%H1606><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H4480>blast<s%> <S%H5397><s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of thy <S%H639>nostrils.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4791><s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> me, he <S%H4871>drew<s%> me out of many <S%H4480>waters.<s%> <S%H4325><s%> <S%H7227><s%>

He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H4480>enemy,<s%> <S%H341><s%> and from them which <S%H4480>hated<s%> <S%H8130><s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> they were too <S%H553>strong<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> me.
They <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> my <S%H4937>stay.<s%>
He brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> also into a large <S%H4800>place;<s%> he <S%H2502>delivered<s%> me, <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in me.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> hath he <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me.
For <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> wickedly <S%H7561>departed<s%> from my <S%H4480>God.<s%> <S%H430><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> were <S%H5048>before<s%> me, and I did <S%H3808>not<s%> put <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.
I <S%H1961>was<s%> also <S%H8549>upright<s%> <S%H5973>before<s%> him, and I kept <S%H8104>myself<s%> from mine <S%H4480>iniquity.<s%> <S%H5771><s%>

Therefore hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5048>in<s%> his <S%H5869>eyesight.<s%>
With <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H2623>merciful<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H2616>merciful;<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> an <S%H8549>upright<s%> <S%H1399>man<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H8552>upright;<s%>
With <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H1305>pure<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H1305>pure;<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H6141>froward<s%> thou wilt show thyself <S%H6617>froward.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859>wilt<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> but wilt bring <S%H8213>down<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H5869>looks.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> wilt <S%H215>light<s%> my <S%H5216>candle:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5050>enlighten<s%> my <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> by thee I have run <S%H7323>through<s%> a <S%H1416>troop;<s%> and by my <S%H430>God<s%> have I leaped <S%H1801>over<s%> a <S%H7791>wall.<s%>

As for <S%H410>God,<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect:<s%> the <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6884>tried:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H4043>buckler<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> those that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H4480>save<s%> <S%H1107><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> is a <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H2108>save<s%> our <S%H430>God?<s%>
It is <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H247>girdeth<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength,<s%> and <S%H5414>maketh<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8549>perfect.<s%>
He <S%H7737>maketh<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>hinds'<s%> feet, and <S%H5975>setteth<s%> me <S%H5921>upon<s%> my high <S%H1116>places.<s%>
He <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%> so that a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>steel<s%> is <S%H5181>broken<s%> by mine <S%H2220>arms.<s%>

Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation:<s%> and thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> hath holden me <S%H5582>up,<s%> and thy <S%H6038>gentleness<s%> hath made me <S%H7235>great.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me, that my <S%H7166>feet<s%> did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4571>slip.<s%>
I have <S%H7291>pursued<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtaken<s%> them: <S%H3808>neither<s%> did I turn <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> they were <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>
I have <S%H4272>wounded<s%> them that they were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6965>rise:<s%> they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
For thou hast <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> unto the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> thou hast <S%H3766>subdued<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me those that rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against me.
Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H6203>necks<s%> of mine <S%H341>enemies;<s%> that I might <S%H6789>destroy<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.
They <S%H7768>cried,<s%> but there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> them: even <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> but he <S%H6030>answered<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

Then did I beat them <S%H7833>small<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7307>wind:<s%> I did cast them <S%H7324>out<s%> as the <S%H2916>dirt<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H4480>strivings<s%> <S%H7379><s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> me the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> whom I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.
As soon as they <S%H8088>hear<s%> <S%H241><s%> of me, they shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> me: the <S%H1121>strangers<s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall <S%H3584>submit<s%> themselves unto me.
The <S%H1121>strangers<s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall fade <S%H5034>away,<s%> and be <S%H2727>afraid<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> their close <S%H4526>places.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth;<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock;<s%> and let the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
It is <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5414>avengeth<s%> <S%H5360><s%> me, and <S%H1696>subdueth<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me.

He <S%H6403>delivereth<s%> me from mine <S%H4480>enemies:<s%> <S%H341><s%> <S%H637>yea,<s%> thou liftest me <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> those that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against me: thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H4480>man.<s%> <S%H376><s%>
Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Great <S%H1431><s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> giveth he to his <S%H4428>king;<s%> and <S%H6213>showeth<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>forevermore.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
